content: {"locationId": "6378", "organizationId": "5404", "name": "FPC Food Pantry", "address1": "901 NE J St", "address2": "", "city": "Bentonville", "state": "AR", "zipCode": "72712", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": "https://fpcbentonville.org/food-pantry/ ", "latitude": "36.3810556", "longitude": "-94.1978214", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Benton", "languages": "English", "features": "", "aboutUs": "Our mission is \"to share God's love by providing food for our neighbors in need in Benton county\".  We operate a drive-thru pantry on Saturday mornings.  You may come for food once a calendar month.  ", "notes": "                 ", "contactName": null, "contactPhone": "479-273-5450", "contactEmail": "foodpantry@fpcbentonville.org", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Curbside Pickup / Drive Through, Outdoor Service, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods, Toiletries / Hygiene Products", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 48, "regionName": "Northwest Arkansas Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "50502410-82f4-41a0-b363-c02df145bb73.png", "website": "https://www.nwafoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Saturday 9:00 AM-11:00 AM", "Saturday 9:00 AM-11:00 AM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
